sentences.en: Anthrax have hooked up with Public Enemy for a metal/rap version of "Bring On The Noise"
sentences.cn: 炭疽乐队和公敌乐队联手合作了重金属加说唱版的歌曲《带来噪音》。

sentences.en: Anthrax is a rare bacterial disease caused by the bacteria Anthracis Bacillus.
sentences.cn: 炭疽病是由炭疽杆菌引致的一种罕见的细菌性疾病.

sentences.en: Black spot disease are mainly walnuts and walnut, such as anthrax.
sentences.cn: 病害主要有核桃黑斑病和核桃炭疽病等.

sentences.en: For example, they can produce anthrax and botulinum toxin.
sentences.cn: 例如, 它们可以生产炭菌病毒和肉毒菌毒素.

sentences.en: For pulmonary anthrax, the drugs must be administered very soon after infection.
sentences.cn: 尤其是肺部炭疽热的治疗,感染病菌后一定要及时用药,否则会有生命危险.

sentences.en: In the interest of controlling anthrax, complete necropsy of animals is strongly discouraged.
sentences.cn: 为了控制炭粗疽病, 对尸体的完全剖检是严格禁止的.

sentences.en: It is not a good idea to culture anthrax in your home.
sentences.cn: 在家中培育炭疽病毒可不是好玩的.

sentences.en: Suppose you tell it that Bacillus anthracis causes anthrax in people.
sentences.cn: 她每事必问,一丝细节都不放过,有礼而不倦.

sentences.en: That is the one of the sad lessons of the anthrax attacks.
sentences.cn: 这是我们从炭疽菌袭击中得出的令人沮丧的教训之一.

sentences.en: The history of anthrax is intimately associated with the history of bacteriology and infectious disease.
sentences.cn: 炭疽病的历史与细菌学和传染病学的历史是密切相关的.

sentences.en: The symptoms of gastrointestinal anthrax are like severe food poisoning.
sentences.cn: 肠炭疽病的症状如严重的食物中毒.

sentences.en: The work on anthrax abruptly ushered in the golden age of medical bacteriology.
sentences.cn: 于炭疽病的研究突然将医学细菌学引入了黄金时代.

sentences.en: They may have weaponized quantities of anthrax.
sentences.cn: 他们可能已将大量炭疽制成了武器。

sentences.en: This mouse was inoculated with anthrax bacillus.
sentences.cn: 这只小鼠接种了炭疽杆菌.

sentences.en: We will develop vaccines to fight anthrax and other deadly diseases.
sentences.cn: 我们要研制用于治疗炭疽和其他致命疾病的疫苗.
